attributes.action: give a non-means tested bursary to ALL students studying nursing and midwivery this includes EU Nationals i.e southern irish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently non-means tested bursarys are only offered to UK residents studying nursing and midwivery, but there are EU Nationals studying nursing and midwivery in the United kingdom.  

By Not ofering the bursary to our foregin colleagues this is classed as discrimination.  Our irish etc colleagues are doing the same job that we are.

i urge you all to sign this petition.
